alert.note: Alert for Adams; Clark; Jackson; Juneau; Monroe; Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 18 at 7:38PM CST until February 19 at 3:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Drifting snow. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Some blowing snow could also occur. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central and west central Wisconsin. * WHEN...Until 3 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the rest of the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...As temperatures drop, wind chills as low as 25 below will occur after midnight. Frostbite on exposed skin could occur in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. For the latest road conditions, check 511ia.org in Iowa, 511mn.org in Minnesota, and 511wi.gov in Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Clark; Jackson; Juneau; Monroe; Taylor
